headline: Uber Autonomy Push Raises Questions On Valuation And Regulatory Risks
summary: Uber Technologies (NYSE:UBER) has launched AV Labs to focus on autonomous vehicle research and product development. The company has expanded its partnership with Waabi through a significant investment and deployment agreement for self driving trucks and robotaxis. Uber has started testing fully driverless robotaxis in San Francisco while facing regulatory pushback in New York City and a key court case on driver classification. Uber Technologies, trading at $79.78, sits at the center of a...
